heros.description: A passionate Front-end React developer based in South Africa. I completed a Diploma in Information Technology(Software Development) at Nelson Mandela University. With 2 years of experience building responsive and scalable web applications. I design creative and eye-catching websites.

skills.skillsDescription: I take pride in my versatile skill set, honed through countless hours of self-learning and hands on experience

about.title: Professional Journey
about.aboutDescription: As a Frontend Developer, I possess an impressive arsenal skills in HTML, CSS, JAVASCRIPT, and REACT JS. I excel in designing and maintaining responsive websites that offer a smooth user experience. My expertise lies in crafting dynamic, engaging interfaces through writting clean and optimized code and utilizing cutting-edge development tools and techniques. My Portfolio
